resources.string:
MBBS – Thoothukudi Govt Medical college,
 Distinctions in : Anatomy, Pharmacology, Obstetrics and Gynecology
 Indian Council of Medical Research(ICMR), Short Term Studentship (STS) award for his Research work in Microbiology, During II year MBBS
 Well known for his MBBS question bank (Leonatez) During his MBBS
 
 MD (Paediatrics) – King George Medical University, Lucknow.
 Divisional level IAP Quiz winner
 Best Post Graduate Thesis Award by Indian Journal of Pediatrics.
 Gold Medalist in MD Paediatrics.
 Publications in National and international level journals
 Currently working as a consultant Paediatrician In Kauvery Hospital, Trichy
 Area of interest is Paediatric Emergency and Critical care.
